name: Hangman (itch) (OM3G4_247)
description:
Just a short basic re-creation of hangman in pygame using basic assets.
Please note there are NO update currently planned for this game.

All additional development time is currently going towards my other title - Super Space Pirate

This game was created as part of an assignment I was given.
I uploaded it here so everyone else can enjoy it too.

If you enjoy it, please consider supporting Super Space Pirate to see more from me.

Thank you and I hope you enjoy it!
